GameConditionDef.label: blood-like liquid high concentration
GameConditionDef.description: A crimson fog, thick and ominous, blankets the surroundings. This mist is a direct consequence of the elevated concentration of blood-like liquid in the air. Despite its apparent harmlessness, a subtle sense of dread creeps in. This phenomenon will undoubtedly affect all beings outside of enclosed spaces.
GameConditionDef.startMessage: Blood-like liquid concentration in the air rapidly increasing.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: Blood-like liquid concentration in the air returning to normal.
